component.text:
Cisco Secure ACS Operating Systems
  • Windows 2000 Server with Service Pack 4
  • Windows 2000 Advanced Server with Service Pack 4
  • Windows Server 2003 Standard Edition
  • Windows Server 2003 Enterprise Edition

Cisco Secure ACS Solution Engine
  • A highly scalable dedicated platform that serves as a high-performance ACS
  • 1U, rack-mountable
  • Preinstalled with a security-hardened Windows software, Cisco Secure ACS software
  • Support for more than 350 users

Cisco Secure ACS Express 5.0
  • Entry-level ACS with simplified feature set
  • Support for up to 50 AAA device and up to 350 unique user ID logins in a 24-hour period

The Cisco Secure ACS for Windows Server must meet certain minimum hardware, operating system, and third-party software requirements. For the most recent information about supported operating systems and service packs, refer to:
http://www.cisco.com/en/US/products/sw/secursw/ps2086/prod_release_notes_list.html.

Additionally, if upgrading from a previous version of Cisco Secure ACS, refer to the Cisco Secure ACS upgrade requirements at:
http://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/net_mgmt/cisco_secure_access_control_server_for_windows/4.1/installation/guide/windows/install.html#wp1041285.

For more information about Cisco Secure ACS Express 5.0, visit http://www.cisco.com/en/US/products/ps8543/index.html.
